items.content_html: Password Manager Pass-op is a lightweight and secure password manager built using React and Tailwind CSS. It allows users to securely store and manage their credentials, including website URLs, usernames, and passwords. All data is stored locally using the browser's local storage, ensuring privacy and quick access.
items.title: amankumarsingh3658/Pass-Op: Password Manager Pass-op is a lightweight and secure password manager built using React and Tailwind CSS. It allows users to securely store and manage their credentials, including website URLs, usernames, and passwords. All data is stored locally using the browser's local storage, ensuring privacy and quick access.
